column5: i live in saskatchewan and i see all the great bait available, ship direct to your door, in the northern states, from places such as cabelas, or the ones advertising on the walleye central classifieds, or vados?. Is there anybody selling bait in canada like this. I use lots of live bait in the year and it seems I am always buying bait by the dozen or by the pound when i would rather buy in bulk.
Hey Gapr.I have tons of jumbo leeches if you need some let me know.I live near Prince Albert.Thanks.
I saw your post and would like to purchase some leeches. Now when you say jumbo how big are we talking. I'm fishing the vanity and need some big boys.
Hi there, I know this may be a long shot but do you still supply jumbo leeches in Saskatchewan? Thanks
